content: In a far, far away universe where whatever is visualized becomes real, a noob tried to visualize a four dimensional object only to end up visualizing an object with an infinite number of dimensions that sent our entire existence into disarray thereby ending the universe as we know it.
translations: ita:In un universo lontano, molto lontano, in cui tutto ciò che è visualizzato diventa reale, un novellino ha cercato di vis
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by saeb (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
